comment: По клику на труп солдата Чорда в уголке

languages.text: Солдата убили внезапным ударом в упор — быстро и тихо.
The soldier was killed with a sudden blow at point-blank range, quickly and quietly.
languages.original_text: Солдата убили внезапным ударом в упор — быстро и тихо.

traits.locale_text: The soldier was killed with a sudden blow at point blank range, quickly and quietly.
The soldier was killed with a sudden blow at point blank range, quickly and quietly.
The soldier was killed with a sudden blow at point-blank range, quickly and quietly.
The soldier was killed with a sudden blow at point-blank range, quickly and quietly.
The soldier was killed with a sudden blow at point-blank range, quickly and quietly.
The soldier was killed with a sudden blow at point-blank range, quickly and quietly.

languages.text: 这个士兵在很近的距离被人一击毙命，杀手的动作迅速，悄无声息。
languages.original_text: The soldier was killed with a sudden blow at point-blank range, quickly and quietly.

traits.locale_text: 这个士兵在很近的距离被人一击毙命，杀手的动作迅速，悄无声息。

languages.text: 「兵士は至近距離から突然の攻撃で、素早く音もたてずに、殺されたんだ」
languages.original_text: The soldier was killed with a sudden blow at point-blank range, quickly and quietly.

traits.locale_text: 「兵士は至近距離から突然の攻撃で、素早く音もたてずに、殺されたんだ」

languages.text: El soldado fue asesinado de un golpe repentino a quemarropa, rápido y de manera silenciosa.
languages.original_text: The soldier was killed with a sudden blow at point-blank range, quickly and quietly.

traits.locale_text: El soldado fue asesinado de un golpe repentino a quemarropa, rápido y de manera silenciosa.

languages.text: Der Soldat wurde durch einen plötzlichen Hieb aus nächster Nähe getötet, schnell und leise.
languages.original_text: The soldier was killed with a sudden blow at point-blank range, quickly and quietly.

traits.locale_text: Der Soldat wurde durch einen plötzlichen Hieb aus nächster Nähe getötet, schnell und leise.

languages.text: Ce soldat a été tué à bout portant d'un tir rapide et précis.
languages.original_text: The soldier was killed with a sudden blow at point-blank range, quickly and quietly.

traits.locale_text: Ce soldat a été tué à bout portant d'un tir rapide et précis.

languages.text: Asker; sıfır mesafedeki ani bir patlama nedeniyle, hızla ve sessizce ölmüş.
languages.original_text: The soldier was killed with a sudden blow at point-blank range, quickly and quietly.

traits.locale_text: Asker, sıfır mesafedeki ani bir patlama nedeniyle, hızla ve sessizce ölmüş.
